slide.title: Exceptions
slide.blurb: PHP 5 also supports the throwing and catching of exceptions using a Java-like syntax. All exceptions are based on the standard %Exception% class
slide.example:
<?php

	try {
		if($a < 20) {
			throw new Exception('$a is too small!');
		}
	} catch (Exception $e) {
		echo $e->getMessage();
	}
?>
